form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Alien Registration Receipt Card ( I-151, I-151

full_text: 8. I have have not engaged in business or employment outside the United States since I became a permanent resident of the United States. (If you have engaged therein, briefly describe and show periods of such employment or business activity.) 9. Since the time I became a permanent resident of the United States, I have filed a federal income tax return as a nonresident. Yes No. (If "Yes", state the years for which you filed tax return as a nonresident. your address shown in each such return, and the location (city and state) of the Internal Revenue Service office where filed.) 10. Since the time I became a permanent resident of the United States, I have failed to file a federal income tax return with respect to income I earned outside the U.S. because I regarded myself as a nonresident alien and therefore exempt from tax on such earnings. Yes No. (If "Yes", state the years for which you failed to file tax returns for that reason.) Not applicable 11. I do do not intend to return to the United States after my temporary visit abroad. 12. I do do not intend to retain my status as a lawful permanent resident. 13. CHECK My Alien Registration Receipt Card is attached. ONE: Application Form-1-90 for issuance of Alien Registration Receipt Card is attached. 14. The Permit to Re-enter, if issued, should be forwarded with my Alien Registration Receipt Card to: My address as shown in block #1, on reverse. U.S. Embassy or Consulate at Taipei Taiwan Republic of Chine U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Office at Other (Specify) 15. I do swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this application signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. (If application completed by other than applicant, that person must execute item 16.) NOTE.- This application may be sworn before an Wu chi- Su Liang officer of the Immigration and Naturalization Service Wu, CHI- su LIANG without payment of notarial fee. (Signature of applicant) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this Cleveland, th day of march A.D. 19 74 at Ohio ROSALYND MANLEY (SEAL) My commission expires Notary Public For Cuyahoga County My Commission Expires June 27, 1977 (Signature of officer administering oath) (Title) 16. SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. Joyce y yeh 684 Jefferson Drive ,Cleveland, 44143 Ohio 3-7-14 (Signature) (Address) (Date) APPLICANT-DO NOT WRITE BELOW THIS LINE Action with regard to Alien Registration Receipt Card Action with regard to application for permit to re-enter 1-151 submitted by Alien returned DENIED (See denial notice for reasonist APR 05 1975 AR-103 or AR-3 submitted by Alien returned GRANTED Permit valid to New I-151 issued on basis of I-90 Single entry Multiple entries Restriction on travel in following countries waived: NONE DATE DELIVERY OF PERMIT INITIALS OF EMPLOYEE OF U.S. APPROVED INS ACTION BY MAIL EFFECTING DELIVERY APR 0.5 1974 TO APPLICANT PERSONALLY DD a DISTRICT William Beathing OFFICE DATE ALBANY, N. Y aloany 4-5-74 3HD 0461145
